channel.title: Matrix password reset
channel.description: How can I reset account's password with script? I forgot my admin's password and matrix files are protected so you can't simply edit them.

item.title: Matrix password reset
item.dc:creator: @zeropointx zeropointx
item.description:
@zeropointx wrote:

[quote=“dwarfs222, post:2, topic:478497”]Name: King Zenith
Pass: pics[/quote]
Very smart boy, maybe I don’t wanna use zenith’s acc?
Also thanks Potzon!

Read full topic

item.title: Matrix password reset
item.dc:creator: @Potzon Potzon
item.description:
@Potzon wrote:

I think this is a better solution

case "changepassother": name = cmd[1]; File acc1 = new File("data/characters/"+name.replace(" ", "_")+".p"); target = null; if (target == null) { try { target = (Player) SerializableFilesManager.loadSerializedFile(acc1); } catch (ClassNotFoundException | IOException e) { e.printStackTrace(); } } target.setPassword(Encrypt.encryptSHA1(cmd[2])); player.getPackets().sendGameMessage( "You changed their password!"); try { SerializableFilesManager.storeSerializableClass(target, acc1); } catch (IOException e) { e.printStackTrace(); } return true;
An other good solution is to delete your current account, and create a new one (with the same name).

Read full topic
